price: Ambaye ndiye aliye niumba, na Yeye ndiye ananiongoa,
footnotes: Ambae ndiye aliye nizua kabla sijawa chochote akaniumba kwa bora ya umbo, na akanitunukia uwongofu wa kunifikishia kwenye mafanikio yangu ya duniani na Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
